      • deleteSiteSOAP

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String deleteSiteSOAP(java.lang.String URL,
                                         java.lang.String siteID,
                                         java.lang.String userID,
                                         java.lang.String password)
        Deprecated. 
        This is not possible using a bus admin user. Maybe via the functional id but we cannot save that password into rtc. Leaving method in case anyone tries to implement it again. Delete a site via the SOAP API
        Parameters:
        URL -
        siteID -
        userID -
        password -
        Returns:
        error code from SOAP response
